Deprecated Classes
org.fest.swing.driver.DragAndDrop
          use ComponentDragAndDrop instead. This class will be removed in version 2.0. 
org.fest.swing.driver.Scrolling
          Use Scrolling instead. 
org.fest.swing.util.System
          Use Systems instead. 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.fest.swing.image.ScreenshotTaker.PNG_EXTENSION
          use ImageFileExtensions.PNG instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.fest.swing.driver.JOptionPaneDriver.button(JOptionPane)
          in 1.2 
org.fest.swing.fixture.JListFixture.doubleClickItem(int)
          to be removed in version 2.0. Use JListFixture.item(int) and JListItemFixture.doubleClick() instead. 
org.fest.swing.fixture.JListFixture.doubleClickItem(String)
          to be removed in version 2.0. Use JListFixture.item(String) and JListItemFixture.doubleClick() instead. 
org.fest.swing.driver.DragAndDrop.drag(Component, Point)
          use ComponentDragAndDrop instead. 
org.fest.swing.driver.DragAndDrop.dragOver(Component, Point)
          use ComponentDragAndDrop instead. 
org.fest.swing.driver.DragAndDrop.drop(Component, Point)
          use ComponentDragAndDrop instead. 
org.fest.swing.keystroke.KeyStrokeMap.reloadFromLocale()
          use KeyStrokeMap.reloadFromSystemSettings() instead. 
org.fest.swing.driver.JOptionPaneDriver.textBox(JOptionPane)
          in 1.2

          use ComponentDragAndDrop instead.
